Welcome

k0dk0d - December 31, 2019

Welcome

Hi there! Welcome to my new website. If this is the only post available, then there’s not all that much here just yet, but more to come. Have a look at the about section on what this blog will be about.

The main things to get here soon are my thoughts and implementation on:

  • Security
  • Privacy
  • DIY electronics

My main focus is on bringing these topics closer to scientists and to help people understand common attack vectors and data loss avenues.

I wish you all the best for 2020, stay safe!

-k0dk0d
